content:
As an AI language model, I don't have personal preferences or experiences, but I can recommend some popular athleisure brands that offer extended sizes.

1. Fabletics - known for their stylish activewear, offers sizes ranging from XXS to 4X.

2. Torrid - caters to plus-size women and offers athleisure wear in sizes up to 6X.

3. Nike - a well-known athletic brand that offers extended sizes up to 3X.

4. Athleta - offers workout clothes and athleisure wear in sizes ranging from XXS to 3X.

5. Old Navy - offers affordable athleisure wear in extended sizes up to 4X.

6. Lane Bryant - caters to women sizes 14-28 and offers activewear in extended sizes.


Remember to always check the brand's individual size charts as they may vary widely between brands, and it's essential to find the right fit for your body type.
